regen.absent_element: automatic revert to default settings after manual switch change at the end of the current time period
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert the power switch to its default settings at the end of the planned or default time period after a manual state change.

regen.absent_element: automated reversion of appliance state after manual switch change at the end of the time period
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically revert the appliance's state to its default settings at the end of the current time period after a manual switch change.

regen.absent_element: notification or confirmation after manual switch change
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify or confirm to the user when a manual change of the power switch state is made.

label: When a manual set state of power ends, the default setting will be used for the next time period.
absence: revert to the default setting after the manual set state ends
